quote: A man's world is different from a woman's world and a man's emotions are different from a woman's emotions and only marriage can bring the two different sets of emotions together properly.
quote_letters: A MANS WORLD IS DIFFERENT FROM A WOMANS WORLD AND A MANS EMOTIONS ARE DIFFERENT FROM A WOMANS EMOTIONS AND ONLY MARRIAGE CAN BRING THE TWO DIFFERENT SETS OF EMOTIONS TOGETHER PROPERLY
